dmca.title: [EV1-C1062624X] You are hosting an ILLEGAL & PIRATE website - TAKE DOWN NOTICE
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. You are hosting an ILLEGAL & PIRATE website - TAKE DOWN NOTICE Added by system at
Friday, Sep 22 2006 04:50 am

MIME element (text/plain)
To Whom It May Concern, 
 
The theplanet.com is currently hosting http://datpiff.com/ a large hub for piracy
and copyright infrigment. 
http://datpiff.com/ provides full illegal downloads of copyrighted material. 
 
The website in question is http://datpiff.com/. 
 
 
Direct links and examples from http://datpiff.com/: 
 
Top Illegal Music Downloads: http://www.datpiff.com/top_downloaded.php 
 
Newest Illegal Music Downloads: http://www.datpiff.com/latest_tapes.php 
 
Illegal Music Downloads By Artist Names:  
http://www.datpiff.com/tapes_artist.php 
 
I could go on and on but I won't waste any more of your time.  Please disable this
website as it is nothing but a hub for downloading copyrighted material. 
 
Thank you
